Translations.Text: Falao shuo:`Nimen ba yiqie gaoming de shushi dou zhao lai jian wo ba!'
Dang shushimen lai dao de shihou, mu sa dui tamen shuo:`Nimen yao pao chu shenme jiu kuai pao chulai ba!'
Dang tamen pao chulai de shihou, mu sa shuo:`Nimen suo biaoyan dique shi moshu, zhenzhu bi shi ta wuxiao, zhenzhu biding bu xiangzhu pohuai zhe de gongzuo.'
Zhenzhu jiang yi ta de yanyu zhengshi zhenli, jishi fanzui de ren bu yuanyi.
Gui xin mu sa de zhiyou ta ben zu de miaoyi; tamen haipa falao he tamen ben zu toumumen pohai tamen. Falao zai difang shang que shi gao'ao de, que shiguo fen de.
Mu sa shuo:`Wo de zongzu a! Ruguo nimen xinyang zhen zhu, nimen jiu yingdang zhi xinlai ta, ruguo nimen shi guishun de.'
Tamen shuo:`Women zhi xinlai zhen zhu. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao rang buyi de minzhong pohai women.
Qiu ni yi ni de ci'en er shi women tuo li bu xindao de minzhong.'

Wo ceng qishi mu sa he ta gege shuo:`Nimen lia dang wei ziji de zongzu er zai aiji jianzao xie fangwu, nimen yingdang yi ziji de fangwu wei libai di difang, nimen yingdang jin shou bai gong, ni yingdang xiang xinshimen baoxi.'

Mu sa shuo:`Women de zhu a! Ni ba gezhong zhuangshi pin he jinshi shenghuo de gezhong caichan jiyu falao he ta de guizumen——women de zhu a!——Yizhi tamen shi minzhong beili ni de dadao. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni hui diao tamen de caichan, qiu ni fengbi tamen de xin. Dan yuan tamen bu xindao, zhidao kanjian tongku de xingfa.'
